author: John Davidson
title: This tech will have you aglow in your new (home) workplace - The Australian Financial Review
description: A fancy new docking station could be the piece de resistance of your Work From Home Little Luxuries.
content: We've tested five such docks these past few weeks (meaning this is anything but a comprehensive review of the docking station market), and by far our favourite is the FireCuda Gaming Dock by Seagate. This is not just because it's very full featured, but also … [+3304 chars]
